alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 11:04AM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations less than one inch. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills, Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, and Denver. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads will be slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.
